Name: Adventures Of Two Foxes
About the game: The game tells the story of two brothers who live in peace after a nuclear disaster. They communicate together, make friends, quarrel and go through difficult times. The world is under threat again, and the main task is to fulfill the father's request. Having set off with the help of a miracle teleporter, the story of two sheets begins. You have to explore a huge world, as well as make key decisions that will affect the end of the game. Each character has his own character, opinion, life goals, and so on. The project can please fans of a deep plot, hardcore platformers, riddles, horror and action. Kill everyone in sight or show mercy? It's up to you...
